basics.name: Christopher Won
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the Department of Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2020.

awards.title: Chancellor Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen students with a minimum overall GPA of 3.8 (4.0 scale) and an 1800 SAT score. These awards are renewable up to 8 consecutive semesters. Students must maintain an overal 3.0 GPA.
